val_canonize:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `preterm.cst -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `preterm.var -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `preterm.add -/

/-
Linear integer arithmetic terms in pre-normalized form.
-/
-- get notation for list.func.set
@[simp]
theorem val_canonize {v : nat → int} : ∀ {t : preterm}, (canonize t).val v = t.val v
  | preterm.cst i => by simp only [preterm.val, add_zero, term.val, canonize, coeffs.val_nil]
  | preterm.var i n => by
    simp only [coeffs.val_set, canonize, preterm.val, zero_add, term.val]
    split_ifs with h1 h2
    · simp only [one_mul, h1]
    · simp only [neg_mul, one_mul, h2]
    · rw [mul_comm]
  | preterm.add t s => by simp only [canonize, val_canonize, term.val_add, preterm.val]
#align val_canonize val_canonize
